alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 1:57PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Heavy snow leading to difficult travel across northern Erie County this afternoon.... At 152 PM EST, radar indicated a band of heavy snow extending from near Harborcreek to near Conneaut, moving east at 15 mph. Webcams indicate low visibility and snow-covered roadways. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility under one quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Erie, North East, Girard, Waterford, Wattsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Lake City, Platea, McKean, Northwest Harborcr and Avonia. Heavy snow rates are overcoming the warmer ground temperatures and allowing for quick accumulations of snow on roads, making them slushy and slick. Hazardous roads and low visibility may lead to accidents. Snow rates will diminish later this afternoon. Consider delaying or postponing travel this afternoon until snow rates diminish and road conditions improve. &&
